identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a sharp, swiss-brutalist barber booking experience that feels premium and precise.

usage_rules.headings: Uppercase, tracking-wide, leading-none. Use for all section titles and hero text.
usage_rules.body: Clean, high legibility. Use for forms and descriptions.

rules: NO GRADIENTS. Flat, solid colors only.
High contrast is key. Black on White or White on Black.
Use Red (#DC2626) ONLY for primary actions (Book Now) and active states.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise texture overlay on the background if possible, otherwise stick to flat matte.

buttons.classes: rounded-none font-bold uppercase tracking-wider h-12 px-8 transition-transform active:scale-95

cards.classes: bg-transparent border border-zinc-800 p-6 hover:border-zinc-600 transition-colors rounded-none

inputs.classes: bg-zinc-900 border-zinc-800 rounded-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-red-500 focus:border-red-500 h-12

calendar.instructions: Customize Shadcn Calendar to match the dark theme. Selected date should be Red.

structure: Hero Section: Split 60/40. Left: Big Text 'SHARP CUTS'. Right: Hero Image.
Services Grid: 3-column grid. Each service in a sharp card.
Booking Flow: Centered, focused container. No distractions.

booking_flow.layout: max-w-md mx-auto mt-12 p-6 border border-zinc-800 bg-zinc-900/50 backdrop-blur-sm

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use the 'zinc' color palette and set borderRadius to '0px' (rounded-none) for that sharp look.
3. BUILD LAYOUT: Create the Landing Page using the Bento Grid strategy defined above.
4. BOOKING FORM: Implement the booking flow using Shadcn Form + Calendar. Keep it single-page application style (conditional rendering of steps).
5. NO AUTH: Do not build login screens. This is guest booking only.
6. MOBILE FIRST: Ensure the grid collapses to 1 column on mobile.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to the 'Book Now' button, Date Picker, and Submit button.

do_not: Do not ask the user for clarification.
must_do: Ensure the booking flow is frictionless.
